const STORAGE_KEY="clearportx.devWallet.partyId";export class DevWalletConnector{constructor(){this.cachedPartyId=void 0;this.cachedPartyId=this.readStoredParty();}async getParty(){if(this.cachedPartyId){return this.cachedPartyId;}if(typeof window==="undefined"){throw new Error("Dev wallet is only available in the browser.");}const input=window.prompt("Enter Canton party ID");const normalized=input===null||input===void 0?void 0:input.trim();if(!normalized){throw new Error("Party ID is required to continue.");}this.cachedPartyId=normalized;this.persistParty(normalized);return normalized;}async signMessage(_message){return"dev-signature";}getType(){return"dev";}readStoredParty(){if(typeof window==="undefined"||!window.localStorage){return null;}try{const stored=window.localStorage.getItem(STORAGE_KEY);return stored&&stored.trim().length>0?stored:null;}catch(_unused){return null;}}persistParty(partyId){if(typeof window==="undefined"||!window.localStorage){return;}try{window.localStorage.setItem(STORAGE_KEY,partyId);}catch(_unused2){// Ignore storage failures (e.g., private mode)
